sentences.sentence: All hype aside, electrification certainly proved to be a good idea.
sentences.translation: 除了所有的大肆宣传，电气化的好处无疑已经得到了证明。

sentences.sentence: On Monday a new committee called the Electrification Coalition was announced.
sentences.translation: 周一，一个新的委员会，充电联合会(意译electrification Coalition)宣告成立。

sentences.sentence: Large parts of the network remain un-electrified, for instance, more than 100 years after electrification was invented.
sentences.translation: 例如，100多年前电气化被发明之后的100多年，仍有很大一部分铁路网线没有采用电气化设备。
